name: ChainlinkClient
description: The ChainlinkClient contract. Contract writers can inherit this contract in order to create requests for the Chainlink network.

eventDecorators.description: Emitted when someone's membership role is being updated.

eventDecorators.description: Emitted when someone's membership role is being updated.
